name: Memory Lane
overview: Released at Vintage Computing Carinthia $1F, this interactive fiction text adventure game by ComSha has been released for nearly every 8 and 16 bit computer system including the Commodore 128 and also the C128 in CPM mode for 80 col. It can be set to use the REU for faster play. This game is a story-based textadventure where you can explore the town and discover mysterious places. Collect multiple items and interact with other citizens. There's just one hook... they no longer seem to remember you. You can reach up to 6 different endings depending on your actions!
